name: 專題討論（一）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)、輔系修習  ◎限碩一修習 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: The objectives of this course are to provide graduate students with the knowledge and understanding of recent development and research trends in the field of earth sciences.
syllabus:
Objectives:  
Earth Science Seminar aims to help students familiar with the emerging issues in Earth Science, engage students in cross disciplinary  
conversations that explore Earth Science issues by divergent perspectives.

Schedule:  
Week 1. Introduction

Week 2-16. Invited guest speakers on different disciplines and Student presentation

methodologies.note: There will be a two-hour face-to-face speech each week.
Communicate ideas with speakers and students in a succinct and clear manner.

grading.note: Score is graded based on the regulations of the NTNU and Earth Department

prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for students taking minor within this department   ◎Exclusive for first year of graduate school ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
